title: GHLCRISTAL
author: GHLCRISTAL
content: Hi i would like to buy any accounts at sports betting bookmakers with negative P&L ie accounts that have lost money overall. Eg. you deposited $1000 into Bet365, placed some bets, withdrew $200 and now the balance is $0.The more negative the P&L is the more i can pay for the account. Telegram @and10and10Thanks
